mapper.select:
SELECT FROM warehouse_out
type = 0
and commodity = #{commodity }
ORDER BY id

SELECT wo.id AS id, wo.out_no AS outNo, wo.type AS type, wo.commodity AS commodity, c.commodity_name AS commodityName, wo.amount AS amount, wo.warehouse_out AS warehouseOut, wo2.out_no AS warehouseOutNo, wo.remark AS remark, wo.user_id AS userId, u1.name AS userName, wo.create_time AS createTime FROM warehouse_out wo LEFT JOIN commodity c ON wo.commodity = c.id LEFT JOIN warehouse_out wo2 ON wo.warehouse_out IS NOT NULL AND wo.warehouse_out = wo2.id LEFT JOIN user u1 ON wo.user_id = u1.id
1=1
and c.commodity_name like concat(concat('%',#{commodityName}),'%')
GROUP BY wo.id
